metadata.description: A Western tale turned on its ear and filled with strange characters and surreal situations.. PUBLICATION IN 7 VOLUMES - COMPLETED SERIES. From what could only have originated from the mind of El Topo director, and The Metabarons author, Alexandro Jodorowsky, Bouncer follows the adventures of a one armed gunslinger and sometimes saloon bouncer in the Wild West's most notorious town. Drawn by acclaimed artist François Boucq in a gritty and realistic style.
metadata.name: Bouncer
